# Drone News 48h Brief — November 27, 2025

_Window: last 48 hours; 75 incidents._

## Summary
In the past 48 hours, drone-related incidents have intensified across various regions. In Texas, multiple reports have emerged regarding Amazon drones causing internet outages, prompting FAA investigations. Meanwhile, tensions in Moldova have risen as unauthorized Russian drone incursions trigger diplomatic protests, with regional responses from Romania and NATO. Notably, illegal drone drops have contributed to prison escapes in France, highlighting smuggling dynamics within the context of regional security challenges. Law enforcement efforts to counter smuggling have resulted in arrests and interventions in various countries. Additionally, the U.S. Coast Guard is enhancing its surveillance capabilities against drug smuggling using drones, emphasizing the dual-use nature of drone technology.

**By category:** airport: 19 • arrest: 2 • crash: 13 • interference: 2 • other: 29 • smuggling: 8 • terrorism: 2
**Top queries:** drone incident (30), drone crash (14), drone illegal (8), drone smuggling (8), drone terrorism (7)
